title: Apso Project Link Schema
description: Schema for .apso/link.json file that links a local project to a platform service

githubRepo.description: GitHub repository in format 'owner/repo' or null if not connected

linkedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the project was linked

lastSyncedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of last sync, or null if never synced

localSchemaHash.description: SHA256 hash of local schema for conflict detection, or null if not calculated

remoteSchemaHash.description: SHA256 hash of remote schema for conflict detection, or null if not calculated

createdBy.description: Email address of the user who created the link
